refnamediv.refpurpose: Temporarily store user credentials in memory

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION

note.simpara: You probably don’t want to invoke this command yourself; it is started automatically when you use git-credential-cache1 .

refsect1.simpara: This command listens on the Unix domain socket specified by <socket> for git-credential-cache clients. Clients may store and retrieve credentials. Each credential is held for a timeout specified by the client; once no credentials are held, the daemon exits.
